content.rendered:
Directed by Neeraj Ghaywan. Kayoze Irani. Shashank Khaitan. Raj Mehta

Written by Neeraj Ghaywan. Shashank Khaitan. Uzma Khan. Sumit Saxena. Sumit Saxena

Cast Fatima Sana Shaikh(Lipakshi / Babloo’s wife). Jaideep Ahlawat(Babloo / Lipakshi’s husband). Armaan Ralhan(Raj / Babloo’s driver’s son). Nushrratt Bharuccha(Meenal / housemaid (as Nushrat Bharucha)). Abhishek Banerjee(Shushil / Meenal’s lover). Maneesh Verma(Vinod Agarwal / Meenal’s boss). Konkona Sen Sharma(Bharti Mandal). Aditi Rao Hydari(Priya Sharma). Shefali Shah(Natasha). Manav Kaul(Kabir / Natasha’s lover). Arvind Pandey(Gopal). Inayat Verma(Binny / Khilauna’s sister). Abhay Joshi(Mishra). Shreedhar Dubey(Police Inspector Jairam Srivastav / Shiv Sharma, Priya’s husband). Gyan Prakash(Factory Manager ; Bharti’s boss). Bachan Pachehra(Dashrath (as Bachan Pachera)). Tota Roy Chowdhury(Rohan). Sara Arjun(Samaira). Imtiaz Ahmad(Durga Prasad). Zia Ahmed(Ashish’s Father). Ambarish Bobby(Man 1). Ajitesh Gupta(Vibhishan). Honey Jain(Girl in Video). 

Languages Hindi

Producers Abhay Bhedasgaonkar. Vivek Bhosle. Vasudha Dhawan. Karan Johar. Apoorva Mehta. Somen Mishra. Rugved Mondkar. Sushant Tungare.

Production Dharmatic Entertainment
